translation: Hello, everyone!
transcript: 大家好！

translation: In today's open course, I will talk about high-performance AI hardware architecture.
transcript: 今天公开课我给大家带来的题目是AI高性能硬件体系结构。

translation: My name is Ouyang Jian.
transcript: 我叫欧阳剑。

translation: This is my personal introduction.
transcript: 呃这是我的个人介绍。

translation: I am a principal architect of Baidu.
transcript: 我是百度的主任架构师。

translation: At present, I focus on high-performance computing for automated driving and heterogeneous computing systems for data centers and cloud services.
transcript: 目前负责自动驾驶的高性能计算以及数据中心和云服务的一些异构计算的系统。

translation: This is me.
transcript: 这是我的照片。

translation: My work experience is simple.
transcript: 我的工作经历比较简单。

translation: My first job was as an intern at Microsoft Research Asia, where I dealt with heterogeneous computing from the hardware perspective.
transcript: 第一份工作是在微软亚洲研究院，在做硬件的一些异构计算方面的一些事情，是实习生。

translation: After graduating from school, I joined Baidu via on-campus recruitment, and have been working here ever since.
transcript: 然后校招毕业之后，就来到百度一直在百度参加从事相关的工作。

translation: Besides work, I also do some academic research.
transcript: 呃在工作之外，在百度期间，其实我在学术方面做了一些事情。

translation: One of my papers was nominated for ASPLOS' 14 Best Papers.
transcript: 呃我的paper也获得了ASPLOS 2014最佳论文的提名。

translation: This was the second ASPLOS paper from China.
transcript: 这是国内第二篇ASPLOS的paper。

translation: I also presented papers at Hot Chips 2014 and 2016, as well as at EUROSYS and other conferences.
transcript: 然后我还在Hotchips 2014、2016上发表过两篇论文，以及在EUROSYS和其他的一些会议上也发表过论文。

translation: I was also invited to deliver keynote speeches at such meetings as MPSOC and Apsys.
transcript: 同时我还受邀在MPSOC、Apsys等一些会议做过keynote speech。

translation: One of my patents has won the China Excellent Patent Award.
transcript: 啊我的专利也获得过得中国专利优秀奖。

translation: These works represent the industry's recognition of the direction of our high-performance AI hardware architecture.
transcript: 呃这些工作基本上都是业界对我们这个这个方向一个AI高性能硬件体系结构这个方向的一些认可。

translation: With regard to AI, we face systemic and holistic challenges.
transcript: 呃其实对于AI来说，我们面临的挑战是系统性的，是全方位的。

translation: Speaking of AI, many people may think that AI is an algorithm or  application.
transcript: 呃大家对AI 的理解可能更多是集中在AI是个算法或者是AI是个的应用。

translation: In fact, AI brings systemic challenges.
transcript: 其实AI 的挑战是系统性的。

translation: First, it is a collection of machine learning algorithms, especially deep learning algorithms.
transcript: 首先它是一个机器学习算法的一个集合，特别深度学习的算法。

translation: Second, we need a huge amount of data.
transcript: 第二，我们需要非常大的数据。

translation: We all know that a large amount of data are necessary for deep learning algorithms, or otherwise, results will not meet expectations.
transcript: 呃大家都知道现在的深度学习算法离不开大的数据，要不然它效果就不好。

translation: Third, we need large-scale computing systems.
transcript: 第三，我们需要大规模的计算系统。

translation: We all know that the emergence and popular applications of AI are inseparable from GPUs, FPGAs, or some new computing technologies used in large-scale data centers.
transcript: 大家都知道AI的呃出现，AI的这个应用的火爆，大家都知道离不开像GPU、FPGA或者说是大规模数据中心这边使用的这样一些新的计算技术。

translation: Meanwhile, we also need large-scale applications to provide more data to facilitate algorithm iteration.
transcript: 同时我们也需要大的应用，大规模应用能反馈更大的数据，能指导这个算法更好的迭代。

translation: That's why I say that the challenges we face are systemic.
transcript: 所以说我们面临的挑战是系统性的一些工工作。

translation: Today's open course is about AI hardware architecture.
transcript: 今天我要讲的呃这个AI公开课，在这个A AI硬件体系结构这个Topic里面。

translation: Three lessons will be offered.
transcript: 我要讲的是大概有三节课。

translation: In this lesson, I will give an overview.
transcript: 那今天我要讲的是一个Overview。

translation: For the next two lessons, I will talk about  GPU architecture and its application in the AI field.
transcript: 后面两节课我会分别讲GPU的架构以及它在AI领域的一些应用。

translation: Then about the architecture and application of the AI processor developed by Baidu.
transcript: 然后是百度自己研发的这种AI处理器的一些架构和应用。

translation: Our self-developed AI processor was made using FPGAs, so I will focus on FPGAs in the third lesson.
transcript: 在这一个节课里面，啊我们自己研发的AI处理器是用FPGA来实现的，所以说也会重点来讲FPGA。

translation: Today, I will give an overview of high-performance AI hardware architecture, which consists of three parts.
transcript: 那今天这节课呢我们会对AI高性能硬件体系结构的这个Overview做一些来给大家的一些讲解，主要分为三部分。

translation: First, we will talk about why services need high-performance AI hardware architecture.
transcript: 首先我们会讲，为什么业务会需要这样一些AI的高性能硬件体系结构。

translation: As well about the background of this new technology.
transcript: 以及这个这种一个新的技术它在什么样的一个历史背景下出现的。

translation: In the second part.
transcript: 第二的话。

translation: I will introduce the background of the evolution of high-performance AI hardware architecture at Baidu.
transcript: 我会给大家讲一下呃这样一个AI的高性能硬件硬件体系结构，在百度的一个演进的一个背景。

translation: I will share many stories with you.
transcript: 它还有很多故事，会给大家分享一下。

translation: In the final part, I will talk about Baidu's outlook on this direction.
transcript: 最后我会给大家讲一下呃这样一个方向在百度未来的一个展望。

translation: I just said that AI brings systemic challenges.
transcript: 刚才讲就是AI面临的挑战是系统性的。

translation: It involves many algorithms, including deep learning algorithms.
transcript: 它有很多算法，深度学习的算法。

translation: It possesses big data, and thus needs to be supported by large-scale computing systems and a massive amount of applications.
transcript: 它有大数据，它需要大规模的计算系统来支撑，它有需要大的应用来支撑。

translation: We know that AI algorithms, especially deep learning algorithms, are very complicated.
transcript: 那我们可以看得到AI的算法，呃特别深度学习的算法，它的算法复杂度是非常高的。

translation: Very often, they involve matrix or convolution computing.
transcript: 很多时候它是一些呃矩阵乘矩阵，或者说一些卷积的计算。

translation: Its complexity may be N to the third power.
transcript: 它的复杂度可能是N的3次方。

translation: In addition, it needs very large models.
transcript: 同时它需要的模型又非常得大。

translation: The deep learning models we used a few years ago had seven to eight layers.
transcript: 大家都知道现在的深度学习的模型，可能是有呃最早在几年前我们用到的模型大概是呃七层到八层。

translation: Today, some models have hundreds or even thousands of layers, and might have several thousands to quadrillions of dimensions.
transcript: 今天我们看到有上百层的模型，甚至上千层的模型都有，而且每一层的模型的维度都是呃上千或者是到几千兆一个非常高的一个维度。

translation: On the other hand, AI application scenarios are classified into online and offline.
transcript: 另另外一方面，在AI的两个利用场景，一个是在线，一个是离线。

translation: For offline applications, we have a large amount of training data.
transcript: 对于离线来说，我们是有非常大的训练数据。

translation: Take Baidu's speech recognition as an example.
transcript: 呃就拿百度的语音识别来说。

translation: The training data may be a speech corpus containing tens of thousands of hours of speech data.
transcript: 这个语这个训练数据可能就是几万小时的语音的语料。

translation: For our advertising system, the training data volume may be tens or hundreds of terabytes.
transcript: 对于我们广告系统来说。

translation: It may cover all advertisements in the past one year or half a year.
transcript: 这个训练数据可能就是几十T或上百T的训练数据。

translation: The data volume is very large.
transcript: 可能是历史上一年或半年所有的广告的预置查到的数据，是非常大的一个数据。

translation: For online applications, our application scale is very large.
transcript: 那对于在线来说，我们的应用规模非常的大。

translation: For example, our voice service may receive tens or hundreds of millions of user requests every day.
transcript: 例如说我们语音服务可能每天要面临几千万次或几亿次的用户的请求。

translation: With such large-scale applications, not to forget our large models and high algorithm complexity.
transcript: 这么大规模的一个应用，再乘上我们的大的模型，再乘上我们非常高的算法复杂度。

translation: We definitely need a large-scale high-performance computing system to provide support.
transcript: 那我们一定就需要一个大规模的高性能计算的这样一个系统来支撑它。

translation: Therefore, my conclusion is that for AI applications, no matter online or offline, large-scale high-performance computing systems are necessary.
transcript: 所以说我的结论就是对于AI的应用，无论是在线还是离线，都需要大规模高性能计算系统来支持。

translation: This conclusion is widely recognized throughout the industry.
transcript: 这个结论应该是也是业界都是比较普遍认可的这样一个结论。

translation: Since we need such high-performance large-scale computing systems, why can't we buy products from the market or use existing solutions?
transcript: 呃那我们既然需要这么高性能的一个大规模计算系统，为什么我们不可以直接从市场上去买或者说用一些现有的方案就可以做。

translation: Why do we instead develop the AI hardware architecture ourselves?
transcript: 而要自己去做这种AI的硬件体系结构呢？

translation: Let's take a look at this picture.
transcript: 呃大家可以看这个图。

translation: This is a rough schematic.
transcript: 这大概是一个示意图。

translation: The green curve represents Moore's law or the development of general-purpose processors.
transcript: 啊绿色那条线是代表摩尔定律或者说是通用处理器发展的一条曲线。

translation: Basically, in the first few decades of the past 50 years.
transcript: 呃基本上大家可能在在过去50年，呃前面几十年里面。

translation: The development followed Moore's law was considerably rapid.
transcript: 摩尔定律发展都挺迅速的。

translation: With performance doubling every two years or so.
transcript: 基本上每两年这个性能会呃double一下。

translation: But recent development has been relatively slow, and so we say that the post-Moore era has arrived.
transcript: 但是最近呃摩尔定律发展是比较平缓的，我们说它进入了后摩尔时代。

translation: The performance of each new generation of CPUs may be only 20%-30% higher than the previous generation.
transcript: 可能是每一代的C CPU处理器，它的性能可能只有百分之二三十的提高。

translation: Therefore, the development is said to be gradual and slow.
transcript: 所以说它的起升是逐步逐步平缓的。

translation: However, we see a booming demand for AI computing in recent years, which is represented by the red line.
transcript: 那我们看到最近几年这种AI的计算的需求是暴增的，就是它的是一条像那条红色的曲线。

translation: The increase is sharp.
transcript: 它涨得非常陡。

translation: The model is getting bigger and bigger, the amount of data is growing larger and larger, and the application is getting wider and wider.
transcript: 模型越来越大，数据越来越大，应用越来越大。

translation: The demand has increased sharply.
transcript: 它涨得非常的陡。

translation: As such, there is a huge gap between the demand and the capability we can provide.
transcript: 所以它的需求跟我们现在能提供的这种能力来比，这个Gap非常的大，非常的大。

translation: Therefore, we cannot buy general-purpose devices to make up the gap and satisfy the demand.
transcript: 为了弥补这样的Gap，所以我们是不能来买通用的设备就能满足这样一个需求了。

translation: There are a few things that need mentioning here.
transcript: 呃所以这里面有有几点。

translation: First, the Moore's law is slowing down.
transcript: 第一点，摩尔定律的发展是在变缓。

translation: It cannot satisfy the development of new AI services.
transcript: 所以它不能满足新的这种AI业务的一个发展。

translation: Second, general-purpose processors are based on the Moore's law.
transcript: 第二点，通用处理器就是基于摩尔定律来支撑的。

translation: They cannot meet AI computing requirements.
transcript: 通用处理器的是是呃没法满足AI的计算需求。

translation: In such a historical context, we must customize the chip architecture for AI applications.
transcript: 在这样的背景下，这样的一个历史背景下，我们一定要为AI的应用定制专有的芯片架构。

translation: This is the earliest starting point of my series of lectures and the original intention of our work.
transcript: 这也是我这一系列的讲座的一个最初的出发点以及我们做这个事情的一个初衷。

translation: Next, I will talk about Baidu's AI processor and the evolution of its high-performance architecture.
transcript: 那给大家讲一下百度的AI处理器，百度的这种AI高性能硬件体系结构的一个一个演进。

translation: Many things happened.
transcript: 这里面有很多故事。

translation: I am pleased to share several stories with you.
transcript: 我可以给大家分享一下。

translation: Baidu can be considered one of the first groups in the industry that put efforts into this field.
transcript: 我们百度做这个事情应该算是业界做得最早的。

translation: Basically, in the industry, we are ahead of others in using GPUs and developing AI chips using FPGAs.
transcript: 基本上啊我们在用GPU也好，我们在用FPGA来自己做我们的AI芯片也好，都是业界走在最前面，走得最早的。

translation: Around 2012, we used GPUs on a large scale to train Baidu's speech recognition system.
transcript: 呃大概在2012年的时候，当时我们就呃在大规模地使用GPU来训练百度的语音识别的系统。

translation: In 2012, we launched many GPUs.
transcript: 呃2012年我们就已经上线很多很多的GPU。

translation: We were one of the first groups that used GPUs in AI.
transcript: 呃基本上也是业业界最早在用GPU做人工智能的这样一个一个行列里面。

translation: In 2013, we found that GPUs were not enough, especially for large-scale online deployment.
transcript: 那很快到了2013年，我们发现GPU是不够的，尤其是对于大规模在线的部署。

translation: Therefore, we quickly developed our own FPGA-based AI chips and launched them on a large scale in 2013 to serve our speech recognition system.
transcript: 所以我们很快就研发了我们自己基于FPGA的AI芯片，并且在2013年就大规模地上线，服务我们呃语音识别的系统。

translation: At that time, the speech recognition used by the Baidu app and our input method was a background service which was created using Baidu's own AI chip.
transcript: 从在那个时候，我们手百上用的语音识别以及输入法用的语音识别，它是后台的服务，其实是通过百度自己研发的AI芯片来产生的。

translation: Then in 2014, many AI applications, besides speech recognition, were actualized at Baidu.
transcript: 然后到了14年，这我们整个AI在百度其实遍地开花，除了语音之外，很多很多的应用场景都得到了落地。

translation: In addition, our AI related system technology developed greatly.
transcript: 同时我们AI相关的系统技术也得到了很多的发展。

translation: For example, we used more GPU clusters and also some 40G and 100G high-performance networks.
transcript: 例如说我们用了更多更多的GPU集群，而且我们还用上了像40G、100G这样的一些高性能网络。

translation: The training scale was very large and so we needed to perform data interactions between multiple nodes.
transcript: 因为训练时候规模非常的大，我们需要多个节点之间进行数据的交互。

translation: Therefore, we needed high-performance networks to provide support.
transcript: 所以我们需要高性能的网络来支持。

translation: At the same time, we also independently developed some AI systems.
transcript: 同时我们也自主研发了AI的一些系统。

translation: such as Paddle Paddle, this kind of open-source system is  quite influential in the industry.
transcript: 像Paddle Paddle今天开源的这个系统在业界上也是蛮有影响力。

translation: We started research and development of this system long ago, probably since 2012.
transcript: 这个系统也是很早很早我们就开始在研发，大概从12年开始。

translation: We used this system on a large scale in 2014.
transcript: 14年我们就在大规模在使用这个系统。

translation: In 2015, our FPGA project was an AI processor project.
transcript: 那到15年，我们做的FPGA项目就是AI处理器项目。

translation: Internally, we called it the "Fairchild project", and it won our company's highest award.
transcript: 我们内部叫“仙童项目”，其实获得了百度最高奖。

translation: Everyone knows that the name "Fairchild" holds special meaning.
transcript: 大家都知道“仙童”这个名字比较特别。

translation: Fairchild is regarded as the pioneer of semiconductors, and it nurtured many great companies.
transcript: 啊嗯其实仙童是一个公司，就是半导体的一个鼻祖这样一个公司，从仙童孵化出来很多很厉害的公司。

translation: When we started our project, we hoped to emulate Fairchild by becoming a pioneer of AI chips and later by nurturing many new technologies and applications.
transcript: 我们当时做的项目的时候也希望呃起这样一个寓意，希望我们干这个事情也是AI芯片的一个鼻祖，然后后面会孵化出来很多很多新的技术和应用。

translation: Today, our AI technologies are used in many scenarios, not only in data centers but also on terminals.
transcript: 同时我们到了今天，我们AI其实在更多的场场景下得到了落地，不光是数据中心的场景，我们百度还有很多端的场景。

translation: For example smart cars and face recognition turnstiles.
transcript: 像我们的智能汽车，还有我们一些人脸的闸机等等等等。

translation: The application on terminals faces different challenges and problems from those in data centers.
transcript: 这些端的场景，它面临的挑战和问题跟数据中心也不太一样。

translation: It has higher requirements on power consumption, reliability, and cost.
transcript: 它的功耗对可靠性、对成本有更苛刻的要求。

translation: Therefore, our AI processors have also further evolved.
transcript: 所以我们的AI处理器也得到了进一步的演进。

translation: Our AI ability has also been recognized by the government.
transcript: 同时我们的AI能力也获得了国家的认可。

translation: China's first national engineering laboratory.
transcript: 中国第一个呃国家工程实验室。

translation: First national engineering laboratory of deep learning.
transcript: 第一个深度学习国家工程实验室。

translation: And also first enterprise-led engineering laboratory, was established in Baidu.
transcript: 这是也是第一个以以企业为牵头的工程实验室，其实落户在百度。

translation: This represents the government's recognition for our efforts.
transcript: 所以说也是呃国家对我们的工作做出了很多的认可。

translation: In conclusion, Baidu's high-performance AI hardware architecture have been iterated for nearly 5 years, from 2012 to the present.
transcript: 啊总结下来就是百度的AI高性能硬件其实已经有多年的迭代，差不多是从12年到今天五年的迭代。

translation: Many applications and scenarios, from large-scale data centers to terminals, are covered.
transcript: 呃基本上覆盖了我们这种大规模数据中心以及到这种端，多种的应用，多种的场景。

translation: Our work is well-recognized in the industry, especially by some authoritative bodies in the industry.
transcript: 呃就是我们做这工作也不光是自己那个在在自嗨，其实际上是得到了很多业界，特别是一些权威业界的认可。

translation: For example, we presented a paper at ASPLOS.
transcript: 包括我们的论文发表在ASPLOS上。

translation: This was the second ASPLOS paper from China and was nominated for Best Papers.
transcript: 这是国内第二篇ASPLOS的论文，而且我们还获得最佳论文提名。

translation: We also presented two papers at another top conference, Hot Chips, in 2014 and 2016.
transcript: 同时我们在另外一个非常顶级的会议hotchips上发表了两篇2014和2016。

translation: We are the company that presented China's fourth Hot Chips paper.
transcript: 基本上我们也是国内第四篇在hotchips上发表论文的的企业。

translation: Therefore, our work is well-recognized by the academic and industrial bodies in both China and abroad.
transcript: 对，所以说国内啊和国际上，无论是学术界还是工业界对我们的工作都非常的认可。

translation: In the final slide, I want to show you the evolution and outlook of Baidu's high-performance AI hardware.
transcript: 呃最后一页PPT我想给大家讲一下，百度的AI高性能硬件会有哪些演进，会有哪些展望。

translation: To sum up, there are two points.
transcript: 我觉得总结上来会有两点。

translation: First, we have done a lot of work in the past five years.
transcript: 第一点刚才讲在过去五年我们做了很多的工作。

translation: But I still think that is not enough.
transcript: 那我觉得不够。

translation: In the past, we did a lot of hardware optimization and fully exploited the hardware computing power.
transcript: 呃过去唔很多时候我们对硬件做了很多的优化，充分挖掘了硬件的计算能力。

translation: However, we think that we still have a lot of work to do in the coming stages.
transcript: 但我们觉得呃下一阶段还有很多工作可以做。

translation: The previous work is not enough.
transcript: 之前的工作仍然不够。

translation: First of all, we want to create whole-stack collaborative design.
transcript: 那第一个就是我们希望要做前栈全栈式的这种协同的设计。

translation: We often hear about full-stack or whole-stack.
transcript: 呃全栈式这个词可能大家听得比较多，啊我们一般叫它Whole-stack或者Full-stack。

translation: It is sometimes used to describe a person's engineering ability.
transcript: 这个有时候会用来形容一个人的工程能力。

translation: In this case, it refers to the whole technology stack.
transcript: 但这个在这个时候我们一般会来说。

translation: In terms of AI, it covers AI applications, AI algorithms, and AI system software and hardware.
transcript: 呃它是包括整个技术栈，包括像在AI来看，我们包括了AI的应用、AI的算法、AI的系统软件及硬件。

translation: We plan to do whole-stack collaborative optimization.
transcript: 我们要做全栈式的这种协同优化。

translation: Only with collaborative design and optimization can computing efficiency be optimized.
transcript: 通过这种优化和这种协同的设计，才能带来最优的计算效率。

translation: Because our application scenarios are broad and diverse, including data centers and our computing terminals.
transcript: 因为我们的场景覆盖面很广，有数据中心还有我们的计算终端。

translation: We seek to achieve optimal computing performance per watt and  per dollar.
transcript: 我们要追求每瓦特最佳的计算性能，以及每块钱得到最佳的计算性能。

translation: Therefore, we have to optimize our software,  algorithms, and hardware.
transcript: 所以我们需要修改我们的软件，修改我们的算法，同时修改我们硬件。

translation: This goal can be achieved only through collaborative work and optimization across multiple levels.
transcript: 几个层次，配合工作，协同优化才能达到这样一个目标。

translation: Second, although many of our works have become widely used internally and also serve many users via Baidu services, we believe we can further deepen our work.
transcript: 第二点，呃就像我们做了很多工作都在百度内遍地开花，用起来，并且通过这些服百度的服务，服务于很多很多的用户，但今天我们觉得可以把这个工作再进一步的深化。

translation: Therefore, we want to build a collaborative ecosystem.
transcript: 所以我们想呃生态共建。

translation: We can put our efforts into two aspects.
transcript: 这里面有两方面的工作我们可以做。

translation: For the first aspect, we can develop our large-scale computing capabilities, including for GPUs and FPGAs, via Baidu Cloud.
transcript: 第一方面，我们可以通过百度云来开发我们大规模计算的能力，这里面还包括了GPU也包括了FPGA。

translation: We can let developers develop the architecture of their own AI chips.
transcript: 我们可以让开发者来开发他们自己的AI芯片的架构。

translation: Architectural requirements vary for different scenarios.
transcript: 因为不同的场景可能有不同的架构的需求。

translation: They can be used in Baidu Cloud before being used to serve other users.
transcript: 在百度云上用起来，再服务于其他的用户。

translation: For the second aspect, we have a national engineering laboratory which we jointly built with Tsinghua, Beihang, and other universities.
transcript: 第二，百度有国家的工程实验室，百度跟清华、北航以及其他一些学校共建了一个工程实验室。

translation: This engineering laboratory is a very open laboratory.
transcript: 这个工程室是一个非常开放的一个实验室。

translation: For we hope to share our capabilities with all AI stakeholders and innovators in China.
transcript: 我们也希望把百度的这些能力开放给所有中国呃AI的参与者和创新者。

translation: There will be more things that can be provided and shared from within this laboratory.
transcript: 这里面能提供开放出来的东西会更多。

translation: Such as our many AI applications involving speech, image, DuerOS, and so on.
transcript: 例如有应用，百度有有很多很多的AI应用，有语音，有图像，有DuerOS等等等等。

translation: We also have algorithms, including image algorithms, speech algorithms, and control planning algorithms, which all have excellent performance.
transcript: 我们还有我们算法，我们图像算法、语音算法、控制规划算法都做得非常的好。

translation: We also have large-scale software systems, such as Paddle Paddle.
transcript: 我们还有我们大规模软件系统，有Paddle Paddle。

translation: And also our own FPGA-based hardware and so on.
transcript: 还有其他一些系统，还有我们的自研的FPGA硬件等等等等。

translation: We will comprehensively share all these things so as to benefit and accelerate the innovation of China's AI industry.
transcript: 我们都会做一个全方位的开放，来服务以以及加速中国AI的一个创新。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 好，谢谢大家！
